text.text_translated: Some people believe that writing down your dreams can open your mind to lucid dreaming. Lucid dreams are a type of dream where you know you are dreaming, and you can also make choices to change what happens in them. So, you could change a nightmare into a safe-feeling dream, or you could direct the plot of your dream like a film director. This means you would create your dreams instead of just trying to understand their meaning. However, you may still want some dreams that can let your mind's deeper part tell you what is on your mind.

best_attempt.text_translated: Some people believe that writing down your dreams can open your mind to lucid dreaming. Lucid dreams are dreams where you are not only aware you are dreaming, but you can also make decisions to change what happens in them. So, you could change a nightmare into a safe-feeling dream, or you could direct the plot of your dream like a film director. This means you would create your dreams, instead of just working out their meaning, though you may still want some dreams which can help your deeper thoughts tell you what is on your mind.
